participant_1.background:
I enjoy baking for my nieces and nephews.
I love trying new foods from different cultures, but I always come back to my favorite: a big bowl of pasta with marinara sauce.
I enjoy listening to classical music while I work on my photography projects.
i play electric violin , and also work as an accountant.
I'm proud of my ability to live on my own and support myself.

participant_2.background:
I want to live in a place with a better climate for my skin.
I made many memories with my family last year.
i love dragons.
we have two dogs small dogs.
my father used to be an insurance salesman.

content.text: I'm a fan of classical music too! What are some of your favorite pieces?
I'm a fan of any music that has a lot of strings. I love the sound of the violins and cellos.
Me too! I play the electric violin myself.
That's awesome! Do you play in a band or anything?
No, I just play for fun. I'm not very good, but it's a fun hobby.
That's cool. I wish I could play an instrument.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun, and it's a great way to relax.
I might just have to do that.
I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Oh, and I have two dogs. What kind of pets do you have?
We have two small dogs. They're a lot of fun, but they can be a handful sometimes.
I can imagine! What kind of dogs are they?
Bichon frises are so cute! I've always wanted one.
They're great dogs. They're really friendly and playful.
